Use this template for investigation tasks and research spikes. Keep answers concise.

# Investigation: [Short, descriptive title]

## Question
What specific question or hypothesis is this investigation trying to answer?

## Background
Brief context and why this investigation matters.

## Scope
- In-scope: briefly list what will be investigated
- Out-of-scope: what will NOT be covered

## Timeline
- Estimated timebox (e.g., 2 days):

## Deliverables
- Summary of findings
- Recommendations
- Supporting data, logs, or PoC

## Attachments / References
- Links to docs, issues, or prior research
